title: Lee Sin avoids yet another patch.
body: Let's all act surprised.  Lee sin remains as powerful as ever while his competition's power crumbles.

replies.body:
Lee Sin isnt good.

He has a combined win rate of 38% in NA and EU LCS and a 46% win rate across all ELOs in soloQ. You say he's "as powerful as ever" when hes actually barely even a middle of the pack jungler in the current meta
Yet nobody bans him in ranked. Why is this?

> [{quoted}](name=xLegendary Troll,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ayf6hiBd,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-02-25T04:36:59.567+0000)
>
> Yet nobody bans him in ranked. Why is this?

Because he is on the "low end" of the tier one junglers. He is a jack-of-all-trades but a master of none. He fits into every single team comp.

The bans in ranked are focused more on the power 3 junglers right now along with a few top/mid laners. I dont believe he is "OP" but he can do everything. If his numbers were tweaked where he had a clear weakness and strength then he would be fine IMHO. Make his mobility his strength (keep it the same it is now), and maybe drop the sustain/slow that is built into his kit. That way he can not sustain through the jungle better than most, and needs to pick his ganks a bit better instead of just diving in and being like "lol oops" and jump right back out after slowing the enemy so they cant turn the fight around.

> [{quoted}](name=xLegendary Troll,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ayf6hiBd,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-02-25T04:36:59.567+0000)
>
> Yet nobody bans him in ranked. Why is this?

Because in bronze / silver giving the enemy team Lee sin is usually a free win for your team. They mostly suck and only play him because "lolOP" when they have 0 clue what they are doing. Lee sin takes A SMALL amount of skill to use well, Not saying he's super hard or anything, but he takes a bit more effort then some other jungler picks to make work.

I'd like to say as a Gold player that this is also true for low-gold range. I've lost probably 8/10 of my past games with a Lee Sin on my team, where as I've won pretty much the same number if the enemy team has a Lee Sin. I feel like the only time he is a problem is if he is a diamond level Lee.
yes, because his does not buy warrior enhancement which did get nerfed.
That 5 damage loss is really gonna stop him in his tracks,  as it also effects all the other ad junglers too.
